headline: Does Warren Buffett Know Something That Wall Street Doesn't? Berkshire Hathaway Is Pounding the Table On a Stock That Has Struggled.
summary: Berkshire Hathaway's latest 13F filing shows that in Q1, it significantly raised its stake in Constellation Brands -- a stock that has not fared well over the last five years.  Berkshire CEO Warren Buffett is arguably the greatest value investor of all time.  This move appears to be following a playbook that Buffett and Berkshire have used many times.

headline: Tesla adds Chiptole CEO to board, Vistra & gas, Berkshire's buys
summary: Yahoo Finance host Madison Mills tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including Tesla (TSLA) adding Chipotle Mexican Grill (CMG) CEO Jack Hartung to its board, Vistra (VST) acquiring natural gas assets, and Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-B, BRK-A) adjusting its positions in Citigroup (C), Constellation Brands (STZ), and Bank of America (BAC). Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Berkshire Hathaway more than doubles Constellation Brands stake
summary: Investing.com -- Berkshire Hathaway has significantly increased its investment in Constellation Brands (NYSE:STZ), more than doubling its stake in the alcoholic beverage company during the first quarter of 2025.

headline: Buffett's new buys: Berkshire sells off remaining Citi stake
summary: In this Chart of the Day, Morning Brief host Madison Mills outlines Berkshire Hathaway's (BRK-B, BRK-A) latest 13F filing and which companies Warren Buffett's firm is now investing in, namely selling off its remaining stake in major bank Citigroup (C) and doubling its holdings in Constellation Brands (STZ). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.

headline: Stock gains, Trump tariff rates, Berkshire trades: 3 Things
summary: US stock futures (ES=F, NQ=F, YM=F) inch higher in Friday's pre-market trading as the major stock market indexes (^DJI, ^IXIC, ^GSPC) are on pace to end this week with gains. President Trump's aims to set tariff rates with US trading partners in the coming weeks. In the firm's latest filing, Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-B, BRK-A) revealed that it sold off its stake in major bank Citigroup (C) while investing heavily into Constellation Brands (STZ). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief here.

headline: Best Stock to Buy Right Now: Constellation Brands vs. Anheuser-Busch InBev
summary: Shares of Constellation Brands have sold off this year amid slowing sales in recent quarters.  Anheuser-Busch is benefiting from its global diversification and brand momentum in key markets.  One of these beer stocks has a stronger growth outlook that could help it outperform going forward.

headline: Warren Buffett shifts from finance to fun as he dumps Citigroup stake and buys up more shares in alcohol-maker Constellation
summary: Berkshire Hathaway's latest 13-F filing reveals it doubled the size of its stake in the owner of the Modelo and Corona beer brands in the United States, while dumping its $1 billion stake in Citibank overboard.
